name: transpose
description: Transposes rows to columns or columns to rows. Can convert field names to column headers, or pivot data for different viewing perspectives. Useful for reformatting data for display or analysis.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of rows/columns to transpose (default: 200)

parameters.name: header
parameters.description: Field to use as column headers in the transposed output

examples: | kvParse() | transpose(limit=1000) | column := upper(column) | transpose(header=column, limit=1000)
notes: Often used with kvParse() to convert key-value pairs into columnar format. Can be chained to transform and then pivot data.
